Interface FailQueueStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultFailQueueStrategy
public interface FailQueueStrategy
FailQueueStrategy allows for configurable failure queues.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    getFailQueueKey(Throwable thrwbl, Job job, String curQueue)
    Determine the key for the failure queue.
    int
    getFailQueueMaxItems(String curQueue)
    Determine the max number of items to keep in the failure queue.

  • Method Details

    • getFailQueueKey

      String getFailQueueKey(Throwable thrwbl, Job job, String curQueue)
      Determine the key for the failure queue. A null return value is an indication that no failure queue is needed. Note that the default implementation (@see DefaultFailQueueStrategy) will never return null.
      Parameters:
      thrwbl - the Throwable that occurred
      job - the Job that failed
      curQueue - the queue the Job came from
      Returns:
      the key of the failure queue to put the job into or null

    • getFailQueueMaxItems

      int getFailQueueMaxItems(String curQueue)
      Determine the max number of items to keep in the failure queue. Returning a value less than 1 means that there is no limit.
      Parameters:
      curQueue - the queue the Job came from
      Returns:
      the max number of items to keep for the failure queue
